dimensionsFormat: Output dimensions match target (1080x1350 for 4:5, 1080x1080 for 1:1, 1080x1920 for 9:16)?
File format correct (PNG for graphics, JPG for photos)?
logo: Logo on transparent background? (Black box/colored rectangle = FAIL)
Logo at least 2x expected size? Readable at mobile?
Logo placement varies (not always same corner)?
textPlacement: ALL text at least 100px from every edge (top, bottom, left, right)?
ALL pill boxes at least 100px from every edge?
CTA bar is the ONLY element allowed at very bottom edge?
ZERO text over any person's face or head?
In split-frame layouts: all text stays on its side?
product: Product FULLY visible — not cut off at any edge?
Product shows REAL packaging text? (AI gibberish = FAIL)
Product placed naturally — not on white card or floating rectangle?
background: Background is LIGHT or VIBRANT? (Dark navy/charcoal/black/dark gray = FAIL)
spacing: Elements spread across frame? (Everything crammed in one quarter = FAIL)
Text coverage under 20% of image area?
typography: Pill boxes FULLY contain text with generous padding on all sides?
attributes: At least 1 attribute is EMOTIONAL (not just data)?
No REDUNDANT claims (same claim in headline AND pills = FAIL)?
sizeVariants: 1:1 version has REPOSITIONED elements (not just cropped 4:5)?
Product fully visible in BOTH 4:5 and 1:1?
All elements within safe zones in both versions?
sceneQuality: Photorealism — looks like a real photograph?
Depth of field looks like real camera bokeh?
No AI artifacts (extra objects, melted details, impossible physics)?
Marble/surface veining continues throughout (no flat/synthetic zones)?
Environmental continuity in product placement zone (backsplash continues)?
Color temperature consistent across full frame?
compositeQuality: Background removal clean? No white fringing or halos?
Product scale correct relative to scene objects?
Product zone is 30-35% of frame (not 40%+ dead marble)?

dimensions.name: Product Integration
dimensions.description: Does the product look naturally placed? (1=pasted on, 10=looks like a real photograph)

dimensions.name: Text Variation
dimensions.description: Is the text treatment unique vs other work? (1=identical, 10=fresh and distinctive)

dimensions.name: Reference Fidelity
dimensions.description: Does layout borrow from proven ad patterns? (1=invented from nothing, 10=clearly adapted)

dimensions.name: Attribute Visibility
dimensions.description: Are product attributes visible ON the image? (1=nowhere, 10=prominent and readable)

dimensions.name: Contrast/Readability
dimensions.description: Can ALL text be read instantly at mobile size? (1=invisible, 10=perfect contrast)

dimensions.name: Dead Space
dimensions.description: Is composition full and intentional? (1=40%+ wasted, 10=every area serves purpose)

dimensions.name: CTA Clarity
dimensions.description: Is there a clear, compelling call to action? (1=missing, 10=strong and visible)

dimensions.name: Scroll-Stop Power
dimensions.description: Would this make someone stop scrolling? (1=generic, 10=genuinely eye-catching)

creativeRubric.calibrationNote: Score HONESTLY. An 8 means 'I would run this ad with my own money.'
